titleStmt.title: A letter from a clergy-man in the city, to his friend in the country containing his reasons for not reading the Declaration.
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: The clergy-man in the city = George Savile, Marquis of Halifax. Sometimes also attributed to William Sherlock.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
